name: sample_app
_desc_title: if the title is empty or doesn't exist then the name will be used
_decs_color: can be omitted, defaults to true, if the app is supposed to use default console color set to false

widgets.title: stdout
widgets._desc_tab_index: allows specifying in which order tab should move from to another object, if omitted auto generated value will be used

widgets.title: stderr
widgets._desc_tab_index: allows specifying in which order tab should move from to another object, if omitted auto generated value will be used
